metadata.title: CVE-2024-26938 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/i915/bios: Tolerate devdata==NULL inintel_bios_encoder_supports_dp_dual_mode()If we have no VBT, or the VBT didn't declare the encoderin question, we won't have the 'devdata' for the encoder.Instead of oopsing just bail early.We won't be able to tell whether the port is DP++ or not,but so be it.(cherry picked from commit 26410896206342c8a80d2b027923e9ee7d33b733)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
